Posts.Content: jules36 wrote: I have a breast exam scheduled for next week, a day before my period is due. I've always been told when I self exam, I shouldn't when it's close to that time of the month. Should I reschedule my appointment for after my period? I didn't know if they would feel something different or unusual because of my period. Sorry for the silly question, just curious? I guess I should call my doctor and ask her. Has anyone else gone to a breast exam while they had PMS? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast exam during PMS??? jules36 Kat63
